name: Long Time No See.
description:
Long time no see is a walking simulator type game that tells the story of a man returning home after the death of a loved one, and is met with a melancholy feeling after seeing how his home has changed.

Controls:

- Move forward - W Key

- Move backward - S Key

- Move left - A Key

- Move right - D Key

- Look - Move mouse

Developed by team WIP for the CreateChester2022 game jam
